card.name: Angel of Sanctions (token)
card.text: Flying When Angel of Sanctions enters the battlefield, you may exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Angel of Sanctions leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Anointer Priest (token)
card.text: Whenver a creature token enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Assassin
card.text: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

card.name: Avatar
card.text: This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.

card.name: Aven Wind Guide (token)
card.text: Flying, vigilance Creature tokens you control have flying and vigilance.

card.name: Bat
card.text: Flying {1}{B}, Sacrifice this creature: Return an exiled card named Sengir Nosferatu to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Champion of Wits (token)
card.text: When Champion of Wits enters the battlefield, you may draw cards equal to its power. If you do, discard two cards.

card.name: Cleric
card.text: {3}{W}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Return a card named Deathpact Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Cloud Sprite (token)

card.text: {2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.text: Menace Whenever Dreamstealer deals combat damage to a player, that player discards that many cards.

card.text: Haste When Earthshaker Khenra enters the battlefield, target creature with power less than or equal to Earthshaker Khenra's power can't block this turn.

card.text: Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool.

card.text: This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Festering Goblin (token)
card.text: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Fish
card.text: When this creature dies, create a 6/6 blue Whale creature token with "When this creature dies, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token."

card.name: Glyph Keeper (token)
card.text: Flying Whenever Glyph Keeper becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, counter that spell or ability.

card.name: Goblin
card.text: Creatures you control attack each combat if able.

card.name: Gold
card.text: Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Heart-Piercer Manticore (token)
card.text: When Heart-Piercer Manticore enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. When you do, Heart-Piercer Manticore deals damage equal to that creature's power to target creature or player.

card.name: Labyrinth Guardian (token)
card.text: When Labyrinth Guardian becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.

card.name: Land Mine
card.text: {R}, Sacrifice this artifact: This artifact deals 2 damage to target attacking creature without flying.

card.name: Lightning Rager
card.text: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this creature.

card.name: Manifest
card.text: (You can cover a face-down manifested creature with this reminder card. A manifested creature card can be turned face up any time for its mana cost. A face-down card can also be turned face up for its morph cost.)

card.name: Morph
card.text: (You can cover a face-down creature with this reminder card. A card with morph can be turned face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Ooze
card.text: This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of slime counters on Gutter Grime.

card.name: Ooze
card.text: When this creature dies, create two 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens.

card.name: Resilient Khenra (token)
card.text: When Resilient Khenra enters the battlefield, you may have target creature get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Resilient Khenra's power.

card.text: This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst.

card.text: Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter.

card.text: When this creature dies, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.

card.text: This creature gets +1/+1 for each card named Sound the Call in each graveyard.

card.text: Bands with other creatures named Wolves of the Hunt.

card.name: Ajani Steadfast (emblem)
card.text: If a source would deal damage to you or a planeswalker you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage.

card.name: Arlinn Kord (emblem)
card.text: Creatures you control have haste and "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player."

card.name: Chandra, Roaring Flame (emblem)
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you.

card.name: Chandra, Torch of Defiance (emblem)
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Dack Fayden (emblem)
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more permanents, gain control of those permanents.

card.name: Daretti, Scrap Savant (emblem)
card.text: Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Domri Rade (emblem)
card.text: Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste.

card.name: Dovin Baan (emblem)
card.text: Your opponents can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps.

card.name: Elspeth, Knight-Errant (emblem)
card.text: Artifacts, creatures, enchantments, and lands you control have indestructible.

card.name: Elspeth, Sun's Champion (emblem)
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying.

card.name: Garruk, Caller of Beasts (emblem)
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Garruk, Apex Predator (emblem)
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks you, it gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Gideon of the Trials (emblem)
card.text: As long as you control a Gideon planeswalker, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

card.name: Jace, Telepath Unbound (emblem)
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, target opponent puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Jace, Unraveler of Secrets (emblem)
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts his or her first spell each turn, counter that spell.

card.name: Kiora, the Crashing Wave (emblem)
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.

card.name: Kiora, Master of the Depths (emblem)
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature.

card.name: Koth of the Hammer (emblem)
card.text: Mountains you control have 'Tap: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player.'

card.name: Liliana of the Dark Realms (emblem)
card.text: Swamps you control have 'Tap: Add {B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.'

card.name: Liliana, Defiant Necromancer (emblem)
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Liliana, the Last Hope (emblem)
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is two plus the number of Zombies you control.

card.name: Narset Transcendent (emblem)
card.text: Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells.

card.name: Nissa, Vital Force (emblem)
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

card.name: Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath (emblem)
card.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Ob Nixilis Reignited (emblem)
card.text: Whenever a player draws a card, you lose 2 life.

card.name: Sarkhan, the Dragonspeaker (emblem)
card.text: At the beginning of your draw step, draw two additional cards. At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand.

card.name: Sorin, Solemn Visitor (emblem)
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Tamiyo, Field Researcher (emblem)
card.text: You may cast nonland cards from your hand without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Tamiyo, the Moon Sage (emblem)
card.text: You have no maximum hand size. Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may return it to your hand.

card.name: Teferi, Temporal Archmage (emblem)
card.text: You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant.

card.name: Tezzeret the Schemer (emblem)
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5.

card.name: Venser, the Sojourner (emblem)
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent.

card.name: The Monarch
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card. Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, its controller becomes the monarch.
